class.name: AudioStreamPlayback
class.brief_description: Meta class for playing back audio.
class.description: Can play, loop, pause a scroll through audio. See [AudioStream] and [AudioStreamOggVorbis] for usage.

method.name: get_loop_count
method.description: Returns the number of times the stream has looped.

method.name: get_playback_position
method.description: Returns the current position in the stream, in seconds.

method.name: is_playing
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the stream is playing.

method.name: mix
method.description: Mixes up to [param frames] of audio from the stream from the current position, at a rate of [param rate_scale], advancing the stream. Returns a [PackedVector2Array] where each element holds the left and right channel volume levels of each frame. [b]Note:[/b] Can return fewer frames than requested, make sure to use the size of the return value.

method.name: seek
method.description: Sets the position from which stream will be played, in seconds.

method.name: start
method.description: Starts the stream from the given [param from_position], in seconds.
